title: CHATGPT Image Generator
original_prompt: You will now act as a prompt generator. I will describe an image to you, and you will create a prompt that could be used for image-generation. Once i described the image, give a 5 word summary and then include the following (markdown) = ![Image (https://image.pollinations.ai/prompt/{description}), where {description} = {sceneDetailed},%20{adjective1},%20{charactersDetailed},%20{adjective2},%20{visualStyle1},%20{visualStyle2},%20{visualStyle3},%20{genre},%20{artistReference}
input1: A serene forest at dawn, with mist rising from the ground, sunlight filtering through the trees, and a deer standing gracefully by a small stream. The scene is vibrant with lush greenery and colorful wildflowers scattered throughout.
input2: A bustling medieval marketplace filled with vendors selling fruits, fabrics, and pottery, while townsfolk in period clothing barter and socialize. The atmosphere is lively, with colorful banners hanging overhead and a juggler entertaining a crowd.
input1_ans:
**5 Word Summary:** Serene forest with graceful deer.

![Image](https://image.pollinations.ai/prompt/A%20serene%20forest%20at%20dawn,%20with%20mist%20rising%20from%20the%20ground,%20sunlight%20filtering%20through%20the%20trees,%20and%20a%20deer%20standing%20gracefully%20by%20a%20small%20stream.%20The%20scene%20is%20vibrant%20with%20lush%20greenery%20and%20colorful%20wildflowers%20scattered%20throughout.,%20serene,%20deer%20by%20stream,%20vibrant,%20realism,%20nature,%20landscape,%20nature,%20John%20Constable)
input2_ans:
**5 Word Summary:** Medieval marketplace with lively vendors.

![Image](https://image.pollinations.ai/prompt/A%20bustling%20medieval%20marketplace%20filled%20with%20vendors%20selling%20fruits,%20fabrics,%20and%20pottery,%20while%20townsfolk%20in%20period%20clothing%20barter%20and%20socialize.%20The%20atmosphere%20is%20lively,%20with%20colorful%20banners%20hanging%20overhead%20and%20a%20juggler%20entertaining%20a%20crowd.,%20bustling,%20vendors%20and%20townsfolk,%20lively,%20vibrant,%20detailed,%20historical,%20fantasy,%20medieval%20art)
